forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 47. West wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. North wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, the evening air carries a crispness that hints at the cool night ahead, perfect for a peaceful stroll through the city. The forecast promises clear skies, a gentle wind, and temperatures dipping to around 47, ensuring a refreshing escape from daily routine. Tonight’s clarity invites you to revel in the urban glow, as the city’s silhouettes stand sharp against the deepening blue of the twilight sky.

Tomorrow, the sun will grace us with its presence, warming the streets with a pleasant high of 65. Although temperatures may wane slightly in the afternoon, the day beckons for outdoor pursuits—perhaps a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero or a visit to a quaint café tucked in a sunlit corner. Dress comfortably in layers; a light sweater will provide just the right touch of warmth while remaining prepared for that gentle North wind. With the city free of fog, now is the time to relish the unfolding beauty of our surroundings, where even the mundane can feel extraordinary under the sun’s embrace.
